Tyr's Protection

Lv 1 Abjuration Spell

Protect a creature from attacks: increase its Armour Class by 2.

Spell ends when the Sword of Justice is unequipped.

18m Concentration

Tyr's Protection is a Level 1 Abjuration Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. It works as Shield of Faith and grants a bonus to Armour Class.

Tyr's Protection Information

Description: Protect a creature from attacks: increase its Armour Class by 2. Spell ends when the Sword of Justice is unequipped. Until Long Rest Level: 1 School: Abjuration Casting Time: Bonus Action Range: 18m/60ft Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: None Additional Details: Can be cast once per battle

Shield of Faith (Condition)

Duration: Remains until fully rested(This Condition ends early if Concentration is broken)

Receives a +2 bonus to Armour Class.

How to Acquire Tyr's Protection

Tyr's Protection can be cast by using the following Items:

Sword of Justice

Tyr's Protection Tips & Notes

Tyr's Protection is the same spell/effect as Shield of Faith (level 1 Abjuration spell).
